name: Textile Mercantile
description:
You, an old business owner must build & buy spinning frames to produce & sell fabric for riches & wealth! 

*WARNING: Progress does not save. Do not leave or exit game if you wish to continue your work.* Controls:
  • Movement: Standard WASD
  • E - Interact to buy and upgrade machines
Developers: Lead Programmers:
Art/Assets:Research:Aki & KashyapHowie & JaydenHowie & Jayden Assets Used/Modified: Character Art:Tilemap & Scene Props:Font:forestSprites by analogStudiosPixel Crawlers by AnokolisaPublic Pixel Font by GGBotNet

 Music Used:
  1. Handel - Water Music (Minousoft 8-Bit Remix)
  2. 8-Bit Dance of the Reed Flutes/Pipes by Anne Good
  3. 8-Bit Don Giovanni - Non ti Fidar by thesir27
  4. Wall Street Rag 8-Bit by hewds
  5. Sunflower Slow Drag 8-Bit by hewds
